alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL DUVAL... SOUTHWESTERN JIM WELLS AND WEST CENTRAL KLEBERG COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palito Blanco, or 13 miles north of Premont, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ben Bolt, Palito Blanco, Rios, and San Jose. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 680 and 694. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
